meanings.definition: A small, elegant piece of jewelry.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful bijou around her neck.
meanings.sent2: The bijou sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The bijou was so tiny, it could fit in a matchbox!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bijou, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The bijou was a precious gem, cherished by all who saw it.

meanings.sent3: The tiny bijou was the key to solving the mystery.
